original_title: Jim Pollock Is Not A Neat Printmaker
overview: A look at the unique hand crafting process Jim Pollock takes to create limited edition concert posters for American jam bands like Phish. Through the labor intensive process of linoleum block print relief carving and printing, Jim has created a cottage industry of loyal collectors and avid fans of his work. Featuring appearances by Page McConnell, Aj Masthay, Brian Shapiro, and others.
title: Jim Pollock Is Not A Neat Printmaker
